channel.title: Technology on I like to explain things
channel.description: Recent content in Technology on I like to explain things

item.title: first blog post
item.description: New year, new blog, new technology This is my first post rendered using Hugo. I chose it over Pelican because: Hugo has a built-in webserver (hugo server serves content on localhost:1313). Hugo has an autorefresh (called live reload) feature that not only detects local changes, but reloads the browser content automatically. Hugo is supposedly the fastest renderer around, though apparently using server-side syntax highlighting may slow down things a bit.
